Privacy Policy Zameen Play INTRODUCTOIN BY INSTALLING THE GAMES ON YOUR MOBILE DEVICE, ENTERING INTO, CONNECTING TO, ACCESSING, AND/OR USING THE GAMES, YOU AGREE TO THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS SET FORTH IN THIS PRIVACY POLICY. PLEASE NOTE: IF YOU OR, AS APPLICABLE, YOUR LEGAL GUARDIAN, DISAGREE TO ANY TERM PROVIDED HEREIN, YOU MAY NOT INSTALL, ACCESS, AND/OR USE THE GAMES AND YOU ARE REQUESTED TO PROMPTLY ERASE THEM, AND ANY PART THEREOF, FROM YOUR MOBILE DEVICE.
Our Games features provided by mobile device, and don\'t collect any information from user. Smart Switch - Phone Clone App allows you to share/move/copy your phone’s data onto multiple devices connected over the same network, at blazing fast speed. For a hiccups-free transfer, you need to authorize the Smart Switch Phone Clone App to access your phone’s internal storage and files i.e. apps, games, photos, videos, wallpapers, music, documents, GIFs, etc.) For offline sharing, Smart Switch Phone Clone App allows you use a QR Code for creating a quick copy of your selected files. Use your e-mail ID or phone number to sign-up today. ICamera helps you to take Pictures/Videos and save them in your device storage for which you need to allow the ICamera to access files on your device. The application will ask you Email Address/Phone Number which will be stored on our servers for registration/record purpose. Easy Contacts - Backup and Restore will ask you to provide Contact Access permissions in order to allow users to backup their contacts securely on our server in encrypted format. Besides these permissions we will need Media Access permission in order to set contact(s) profile images ans we also collect your Email or Phone Number for registration purpose. Personal data is information, or a combination of pieces of information that could reasonably allow you to be identified. We collect personal data when logged-in via Email or Phone, information we generate about you in the course of our relationship with you, and information we collect about you from other sources, including commercially available sources, such as public databases (where permitted by law), and third-party services (such as third-party social media companies, advertising partners, and analytics providers). \n We may collect the following categories of personal data from and about you: \n 1. Personal details (e.g., age range, gender, nickname, etc.); \n 2. Contact details (e.g., phone number, email address); \n 3. Authentication and identification information (e.g., user identification number, username, image); \n 4. Transactional information (e.g., information relating to any of your requests, queries, or complaints); \n 5. Information we collect automatically from you including internet or other electronic network activity information, such as the data we receive when you interact with our app (e.g., your search history, log data, or actions you take within the app) or information about your device (e.g., your device version, operating system, system language and regions, and identification number), and the information about the other apps you have installed; \n 6. subject to requirements under applicable law, coarse geolocation data, such as location information we receive about you (e.g., based on your IP address, Wi-Fi SSID, etc.); \n 7. Device Contacts : We may collect your Device Contacts, which require Files Sharing with intended contacts and to Backup your contacts required for some applications, we save your contacts securely on our servers in encrypted form. \n Your contact information will be collected in following ways: \n \t 1. Files Sharing: We may collect Phone Numbers of the intended users for Files Sharing purposes and store them securely on our server. \n \t 2. Contact Backup: We may collect all your contacts for Contacts Backup purposes in some of our applications as a part of service and store them securely on our server. The Games may contain links to other websites and online services, including third-party advertisements. If you choose to click through to one of these other websites or online services, please note that any information you may provide will be subject to the privacy policy and other terms and conditions of that websites or service, and not to this Privacy Policy. We do not share your data with third-party websites or services, and as a matter of fact, a link to such website or service does not appear in the Games. You agree that our application will have no liability for any matters relating to a third-party website or service that you provide information to, including their collection and handling of that information. We reserves the right to share your information with third parties if we believe such action is necessary in order to ● Conform to the requirements of the law or to comply with legal process served upon us. ● Protect or defend our legal rights or property. ● Investigate, prevent or take action regarding illegal activities, suspected fraud, situations involving potential threats to the physical safety of any person or violations of the terms and conditions of using our Games and Games and Services. ● Contact Read Permission ● Camera: Take photos and videos ● Storage Permission ● Read the contents of your USB storage ● Photo media files ● Read phone state ● Internet ● Billing permission ZamenPlay has implemented technology and policies to safeguard your privacy from unauthorized access and improper use. ZamenPlay has implemented technology and policies to safeguard your privacy from unauthorized access and improper use. This Privacy Policy may be updated for any reason. Enable root access Require pressing Back twice to leave the app
Simple File Manager Pro - Manage files easy & fast
Easy app for managing your files without ads, respecting your privacy & security
A lightweight quick file manager for everyday use. It offers a userful search functionality, you can also customize the home folder and select favorite folders for quick access.
The app contains multiple powerful security related functions, like password protecting hidden items, deleting files, or the whole app. You can choose between using a pattern, pin, or a fingerprint to keep your data private.
This modern file organizer supports fast browsing of root files, SD cards and USB devices.
To keep your productive, it obviously has all the standard file operations like rename, copy, move, delete, share etc. It can also be used for saving up some storage, since it allows compressing and decompressing too. You can easily create new files or folders if you wish so.
You can obviously select sorting by multiple different values, toggle between ascending and descending, or use a folder specific sorting.
By just a few clicks you can also check file or folder properties, which shows various fields like the file size, date of the last modification, or EXIF values like the creation date, camera model at photos etc.
To get a file or folders path quickly, you can easily select it by long pressing and copying it in the clipboard.
You can create handy desktop shortcuts for accessing your favorite items quickly.
It contains a light file editor that you can use either for printing documents, editing them, or read easily with using zoom gestures, whenever needed.
It comes with material design and dark theme by default, provides great user experience for easy usage. The lack of internet access gives you more privacy, security and stability than other apps.
Contains no ads or unnecessary permissions. It is fully opensource, provides customizable colors.
Check out the full suite of Simple Tools here: https://www.google.com
Standalone website of Simple File Manager Pro: https://www.google.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/
